page.title: 10My Day(Mr.A.Tildesley Snr.)
page.content: Having just retired I find that my day has changed dramatically,although we still rise at 6-30,as we did when we had to earn a living.I used to have a very full life as a plumbing contractor trying to please my clients & complet- -ing all the Clerical work.Now there is time for a quiet Breakfast without the Phone constantly ringing.The new T.V. Programmes let us know World Events as early as 6-30.I am lucky that I am able to stroll down to my son's workshop for a few hours each day to keep my brain& hands active.After Lunch I generally do a few hours in the Garden or I like to read or watch the old films on T.V. that I missed when I was working.I also enjoy the Open University Pro- -grammes.I enjoy Sport as a spectator when Kara is swimming & she & I play table tennis together.
